text: The Women's 1500 metre freestyle competition at the 2019 World Championships was held on 22 and 23 July 2019.ScheduleStart list The defending champion was Katie Ledecky, but she was forced to withdraw due to illness.[https://www.olympicchannel.com/en/stories/live/detail/fina-world- championships-2019-live-23-july/ ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. ==Results== ===Heats=== The heats were started on 22 July at 11:23.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
